10:28 <ClemensR> vmassol: about your bug report JENKINS 21315  - I looked at the code a bit and I guess it is caused be the build results created with the 1.546-jenkins  
10:29 <vmassol> ah  
10:29 <ClemensR> deleteing these builds from the jenkins instance should fix the issue  
10:29 <vmassol> so cleaning them would fix the issue  
10:29 <ClemensR> maybe ;)  
10:29 <ClemensR> yes, sync :)  
10:29 <vmassol> need to find where they are, not much time ATM, if someone can do it, that would be great

11:28 <vmassol> tmortagne: just rebuilt XE from sources and got the following when starting it:  
11:28 <vmassol> http://pastebin.com/raw.php?i=edkmRd6b  
11:29 <tmortagne> right, looks like I forgot to update component.txt, I'm surprised platform build at all  
11:30 <tmortagne> we should maybe have a maven plugin that check component.txt validity  
11:31 <vmassol> better  
11:31 <vmassol> have a plugin that generates components.txt  
11:31 <vmassol> :)  
11:32 <vmassol> (we would need an annotation for the priorty but that's doable and maybe not a bad idea)  
11:32 <tmortagne> probably
